name: JellyScout
description: Advanced movie & TV discovery plugin with streaming and download capabilities. Search TMDB, check library status, and stream or download content seamlessly with real-time notifications.
overview: ðŸŽ¬ Discover, stream, and download movies and TV shows directly from your Jellyfin server with JellyScout - featuring TMDB integration, real-time notifications, and a beautiful modern interface.

versions.changelog: Complete rewrite with modern architecture, API integration, and enhanced features. Added comprehensive API integration with Streamio, Sonarr, and Radarr. Implemented advanced filtering, playlist support, and configuration validation.
Initial development version with basic TMDB integration and streaming capabilities
